specific_questions: What is the main job of the Public Protector?

MUST name the Human Rights Commission and its function (promoting/protecting rights).

follow_up_evals.question: How are members of the Human Rights Commission appointed?
follow_up_evals.ideal_answer: According to the text, members of the South African Human Rights Commission are appointed by the President on the recommendation of the National Assembly.
